messages.message: @Jason I think what Bofa is looking is specifically for OCR/ Deep Learning/Image processing.

I looked at the ticket and it looks like Sapna opened it.  Do you know why she is asking?  In some sense, this could simply be a marketing slide: "The life of a document...."  That doesn't seem useful in an engineering context, though.  That's why I normally just show a picture of a flow with the steps of Digitization (OCR/image processing) -> Classification (DL) -> Extraction (DL) -> Refinement and integration.
@Jason - In that case, can we share slides 26-34 for now and take it up if they come back with any questions?
Alternatively, we could respond in the ticket with clarification looking for how this will be used in order to give them the right product.  Otherwise, 26-34 is likely to be the right answer.
@dg - Can you check with Sapna the reason for this request?
